title: One Piece Episode 2 Review
author: Unknown
description: Review and analysis of One Piece episode content, though this appears to focus on the Netflix live-action adaptation rather than the 1999 anime episode.

title: Sunny Go One Piece Podcast
author: Sunny Go Podcast Team
description: Fan podcast that rewatches 3 episodes of the anime series at a time and discusses thoughts, themes, and differences between the manga and anime in a mostly spoiler-free manner. Episodes 1-3 would cover Episode 2.

title: The One Piece Podcast
author: One Piece Podcast Team
description: Fan-run podcast that discusses the Shonen Jump manga One Piece and the corresponding anime by Toei Animation.

title: Episode 2 | One Piece Wiki | Fandom
author: Multiple Contributors
description: Comprehensive wiki page for Episode 2 including plot summary, character debuts, trivia, manga differences, and production details.

title: Two Dudes One Piece Podcast
author: Hayden and Evan
description: Podcast discussing the Straw Hat Pirates and their adventures, focusing primarily on current content but occasionally covering classic episodes.
